title: Mobile Outdoor Mathematical Modeling for Solving Community Environmental Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Field-centered learning for current secondary education practitioners to solve community environmental issues through mathematical modeling.

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze local community environmental data to build linear/nonlinear regression models.
Learners can visualize modeling results and create diagnostic reports of issues through VR simulations
Learners can share field survey data in real-time using mobile devices and derive collaborative problem-solving strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
